field_body.value:
A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It chunks several different (but related) components of information into one digestible unit.  Cards present a teaser image, title, summary, and link to additional details. An Editor can add multiple cards and choose a layout for the group, like a Grid of 3xN

Cards in ezContent can be displayed in two ways:
1)  Horizontal Cards 
2) Vertical Cards

 

See Sample Card Component below:
